title: Register in under 10 seconds!
description: Send an email to register@internetblog.co with the title of your website as the subject (one word, no caps), and get started immediately. If you use gmail, get started immediately by clicking here"

title: View Blog on your personal webpage!
description: View your website at internetblog.co/{name of your blog}

title: Post blogs seamelessly!
description: To post, send an email to publish@internetblog.co with the title of the post as the subject, and the contents as the body.

title: Delete posts with ease.
description: Sometimes your posts don't age well. Sometimes you have typo. Delete a post by sending an email to delete@internetblog.co with your post url in the title!
